headline: A Look At Akamai Technologies (AKAM) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Recent performance and business snapshot Akamai Technologies (AKAM) has been on many watchlists after recent share price moves, with the stock up around 14% over the past month and about 30% over the past 3 months. The company reported revenue of roughly US$4.1b and net income of about US$506.9m, supported by its mix of security, content delivery, and cloud computing services that cater to web, API, media, and application workloads globally. See our latest analysis for Akamai...
